participant_1.background:
I have never been arrested, but I have had my fair share of close calls.
I love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix.
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.

participant_2.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: What are some of your hobbies?
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it. I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
That sounds like a really cool hobby. I love to read books from the bookstore with my mom. I also love spending time with my family and bingeing on Netflix.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your family. I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
I love dogs! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best dog in the world.
I'm sure he is! I love golden retrievers. They're so friendly and loving.
He really is. He's the best friend a person could ask for.
That's awesome. I'm glad you have him in your life.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to surf often. It's a great way to stay in shape and clear my head.
That sounds really fun. I've never surfed before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely give it a try. It's a lot of fun and it's a great workout.
I'll have to look into it.
